title: WATCH: This feel-good performance by the Ndlovu Youth Choir for the Springboks will make your day
text:
WATCH: This feel-good performance by the Ndlovu Youth Choir for the Springboks will make your day share this

Johannesburg – What better way to spur on the Springboks for their World Cup quarter-final match than a performance by the Ndlovu Youth Choir?

The group teamed up with Woolworths to surprise shoppers and Springbok supporters at the Mall of Africa with a performance.

As with every performance they delivered while taking part in America's Got Talent, this one sent shivers down our spine as well.

The choir was met with cheers as they belted out Shosholoza to the tune of drums.

"Good luck to the Springboks for their quarter-final match this weekend! We back you, along with the rest of South Africa. Uniting a nation through song and sport," they captioned the clip on Facebook.

The Springboks take on Japan in the Rugby World Cup quarter-finals on Sunday 20 October.

If you're looking for a feel-good video to make your day, then this is for you.
